metadata.title: AI Image Generator

generator.description: Generate images with AI models, support text-to-image and image-to-image.

form.prompt_placeholder: Describe the details of the image, such as color, shape, texture, etc.
form.reference_image_placeholder: Upload reference images for editing or merging
form.reference_image_hint_merge: {count} images uploaded - will be merged into one
form.reference_image_hint_pro_only: Multi-image merge requires Nano Banana Pro
form.some_images_failed_to_upload: Some images failed to upload, please delete them and re-upload

generator.style_tip: Click a style to add it to your prompt. Combine multiple styles for unique results.
generator.edit_image_loaded: Image loaded for editing. Enter your editing instructions.
